name: Awesome Flavored Soda Jelly Dessert Restaurant
name_original: Awesome Flavored Soda Jelly Dessert Restaurant
description:
Ever wanted to own your own restaurant? This is the perfect game for you! Awesome Flavored Soda Jelly Dessert Restaurant is a unique maker game that let's you create delicious pop drinks! Choose your favorite cups and straws and top it off with unique decorations!

[Features]
-Includes dozens of delicious flavors! Sweet, sweeter, and even weird flavors!
-Decorations to top off your awesome drink!
-Unique designs for cups and straws!
-Save and share your favorites to friends and family!





*NOTE: This game is free to play but offers in-game purchases that are made with real money.
